body:
It has been 2 weeks since my ban (Since June 19th). I've contacted support@avicus.net a day after I was banned, yet no reply (I understand you can be busy but still). I was banned for 'Kill aura'. Jozzmcozz banned me. I contacted him on skype. I talked to him about the ban and stuff. He had the evidence of me hacking yet he doesn't give it to me. Today, (2nd of July) I said Hi Jozzeh, he then removes me as a contact. Was I annoying? No. I respect Jozz and how he does he's job as a moderator of this server. I don't know why he deleted me. I want to see the 'evidence'. Maybe get unbanned?
Picture when connecting to the server: http://imgur.com/7oLk9tq
body_tagged:

title: Banned

replies.body: Resend an appeal to the support email.
replies.body_tagged: Resend an appeal to the support email.

replies.body: Really..? Btw sorry the text is blue..
replies.body_tagged: Really..? Btw sorry the text is blue..

replies.body: Try making a map or something. That'll show them you're dedicated and loyal to avicus
replies.body_tagged: Try making a map or something. That'll show them you're dedicated and loyal to avicus

replies.body: It wasn't being rude, he probably thought you were gonna ask him for the evidence again which would have been really annoying for him, and staff do not have to give you the evidence if they would not wish to, and remember, making a forum post just makes your chances smaller to get appealed
replies.body_tagged: It wasn't being rude, he probably thought you were gonna ask him for the evidence again which would have been really annoying for him, and staff do not have to give you the evidence if they would not wish to, and remember, making a forum post just makes your chances smaller to get appealed

replies.body: But Jozz suggested to.. Nvm.. He said doing it through the email would make things tougher.
replies.body_tagged: But Jozz suggested to.. Nvm.. He said doing it through the email would make things tougher.

replies.body: suggested to..? you mean he told you to contact a manager? if so he is not one....

replies.body: Emails can easily be lost considering the huge amount the staff team receive every day.

reply_to.body: Really..? Btw sorry the text is blue..

replies.body: Ok, I'll appeal another one at the email.
replies.body_tagged: Ok, I'll appeal another one at the email.

replies.body:
Hello.

I removed you from my contacts list because of the insane amount of Skype contacts I have. I kept the ones who are active, and who are not banned. Sorry if it was rude and unexpected, my apologies. 
You may add me as a friend again.

Going back the the evidence. As vlad stated, it's not mandatory to show you proof. However, I can show fellow staff members from preventing appeals.
replies.body_tagged:
Hello.

I removed you from my contacts list because of the insane amount of Skype contacts I have. I kept the ones who are active, and who are not banned. Sorry if it was rude and unexpected, my apologies. 
You may add me as a friend again.

Going back the the evidence. As vlad stated, it's not mandatory to show you proof. However, I can show fellow staff members from preventing appeals.

replies.body:
I've heard the wait time for a response to these "appeal" emails take a long time.
Why not just make a forum section called "appeals" where only members of the staff team can reply to a thread?
replies.body_tagged:
I've heard the wait time for a response to these "appeal" emails take a long time.
Why not just make a forum section called "appeals" where only members of the staff team can reply to a thread?

`Kill aura´By Jozzmcozz

`Kill aura´By Jozzmcozz

replies.body:
You have to register for the torums with /register in-game, if you're banned, you cant go on the server, so you can't register.

We're thinking of ways to have a better appeals system.

replies.body:
I don't think it's fair for someone to get banned without them seeing any evidence at all... 
If a player is banned, he/she SHOULD be allowed to see the evidence.
